body_html:
Alright, I've pushed the next patch. Here's what's included:

  • Altered handling of on_value, off_value, and dtype in array_ops.py to match requested implementation
  • Removed int8, int16, uint8 registration
  • Modified default value tests to match how dtype handles mismatches
  • Add tests to assert TypeErrors when on_value and off_value are of different types, or when either of their types differs from dtype
  • Added a documentation to describe new behavior and provide example of default value use
body_text:
Alright, I've pushed the next patch. Here's what's included:

Altered handling of on_value, off_value, and dtype in array_ops.py to match requested implementation
Removed int8, int16, uint8 registration
Modified default value tests to match how dtype handles mismatches
Add tests to assert TypeErrors when on_value and off_value are of different types, or when either of their types differs from dtype
Added a documentation to describe new behavior and provide example of default value use
body:
Alright, I've pushed the next patch. Here's what's included:
- Altered handling of `on_value`, `off_value`, and `dtype` in array_ops.py to match requested implementation
- Removed int8, int16, uint8 registration
- Modified default value tests to match how dtype handles mismatches
- Add tests to assert TypeErrors when `on_value` and `off_value` are of different types, or when either of their types differs from `dtype`
- Added a documentation to describe new behavior and provide example of default value use
